title: Problem 2057_C
statement: In the upcoming year, there will be many team olympiads, so the teachers of "T-generation" need to assemble a team of three pupils to participate in them. Any three pupils will show a worthy result in any team olympiad. But winning the olympiad is only half the battle; first, you need to get there...Each pupil has an independence level, expressed as an integer. In "T-generation", there is exactly one student with each independence levels from l to r, inclusive. For a team of three pupils with in
